pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Raptor $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() False $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Aggressive $(br)$(l)Type:$() Pack Hunter $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Hot Biomes

The Utahraptor is a pack-hunting, medium-sized carnivore. Upon finding a suitable hunting target, it'll crouch down and stalk it for up to a few seconds before breaking into a chase and gaining Speed and Strength for a short amount of time. Sometimes, a Utahraptor will land a lucky hit on a tendon and give it's target Weakness.
